alert.note: Alert for Comerio; Dorado; Naranjito; Toa Alta; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 19 at 9:08PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Comerio, Dorado, Naranjito, Toa Alta and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 807 PM AST, River gauges indicated that Rio de la Plata still is out of its banks from excessive runoff from previous rainfalls. - Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naranjito, Toa Alta, Comerio, Toa Baja, Dorado, Pajaros, Galateo, Rio Lajas, Candelaria, San Jose, Candelaria Arenas, Campanilla, Ingenio, Palomas and Mucarabones.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Comerio; Dorado; Naranjito; Toa Alta; Toa Baja
